025package org.forgerock.openidm.external.email.impl;
026
027import com.sun.mail.util.MailSSLSocketFactory;
028import java.util.Map;
029
030import java.util.Properties;
031import javax.mail.Message;
032import javax.mail.MessagingException;
033import javax.mail.Session;
034import javax.mail.Transport;
035import javax.mail.internet.AddressException;
036import javax.mail.internet.InternetAddress;
037import javax.mail.internet.MimeMessage;
038import org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonValue;
039import org.forgerock.json.resource.BadRequestException;
040
041/**
042 *
043 * @author gael
044 */
045public class EmailClient {
046
047    private String host = "localhost";
048    private String port = "25";
049    private String username = null;
050    private String password = null;
051    private String fromAddr = null;
052    private boolean smtpAuth = false;
053    private Properties props = new Properties();
054    private Session session;
055
056    public EmailClient(JsonValue config) throws RuntimeException {
057        if (config.get("host").asString() != null) {
058            host = config.get("host").asString();
059            props.put("mail.smtp.host", host);
060        }
061        if (config.get("port").asString() != null) {
062            port = config.get("port").asString();
063            props.put("mail.smtp.port", port);
064        }
065        if (config.get("from").asString() != null) {
066            fromAddr = config.get("from").asString();
067        }
068
069        if (config.get("mail.smtp.auth").asString().equalsIgnoreCase("true")) {
070            if (config.get("username").asString() != null) {
071                username = config.get("username").asString();
072            } else {
073                throw new RuntimeException("No username provided for SMTP auth");
074            }
075            if (config.get("password").asString() != null) {
076                password = config.get("password").asString();
077            } else {
078                throw new RuntimeException("No password provided for SMTP auth");
079            }
080            props.put("mail.smtp.auth", "true");
081            smtpAuth = true;
082        }
083
084        if (config.get("mail.smtp.starttls.enable").asString().equalsIgnoreCase("true")) {
085            props.put("mail.smtp.starttls.enable", "true");
086
087            // temporary hack to avoid cert check
088            try {
089                MailSSLSocketFactory sf = new MailSSLSocketFactory();
090                sf.setTrustAllHosts(true);
091                props.put("mail.smtp.ssl.socketFactory", sf);
092            } catch (Exception e) {
093            }
094        }
095
096        session = Session.getInstance(props);
097    }
098
099    /**
100     * Send the email according to the parameters in <em>params</em>:
101     *
102     * from : the From: address
103     * to : The To: recipients - a comma separated email address strings
104     * cc: The Cc: recipients - a comma separated email address strings
105     * bcc: The Bcc: recipients - a comma separated email address strings
106     * subject: The subject
107     * body : the message body
108     *
109     * @param params a JsonValue containing the from, to, cc, bcc, subject, and body parameters
110     * @throws BadRequestException
111     */
112    public void send(JsonValue params) throws BadRequestException {
113        InternetAddress from = null;
114        InternetAddress[] to = null;
115        InternetAddress[] cc = null;
116        InternetAddress[] bcc = null;
117
118        String subject = params.get("subject")
119                .defaultTo(params.get("_subject"))
120                .defaultTo("<no subject>")
121                .asString();
122
123        try {
124            if (!params.get("from").isNull()) {
125                from = new InternetAddress(params.get("from").asString());
126            } else if (!params.get("_from").isNull()) {
127                from = new InternetAddress(params.get("_from").asString());
128            } else if (fromAddr != null) {
129                from = new InternetAddress(fromAddr);
130            } else { // we don't have a from, need to throw
131                throw new BadRequestException("From: email address is absent");
132            }
133        } catch (AddressException ae) {
134            throw new BadRequestException("Bad From: email address");
135        }
136
137        try {
138            to = InternetAddress.parse(params.get("to").defaultTo(params.get("_to")).asString());
139        } catch (AddressException ae) {
140            throw new BadRequestException("Bad To: email address");
141        }
142
143        try {
144            if (!params.get("cc").isNull()) {
145                cc = InternetAddress.parse(params.get("cc").asString());
146            } else if (!params.get("cc").isNull()) {
147                cc = InternetAddress.parse(params.get("_cc").asString());
148            }
149        } catch (AddressException ae) {
150            throw new BadRequestException("Bad Cc: email address");
151        }
152
153        try {
154            if (!params.get("bcc").isNull()) {
155                bcc = InternetAddress.parse(params.get("bcc").asString());
156            } else if (!params.get("_bcc").isNull()) {
157                bcc = InternetAddress.parse(params.get("_bcc").asString());
158            }
159        } catch (AddressException ae) {
160            throw new BadRequestException("Bad Bcc: email address");
161        }
162
163        try {
164            Message message = new MimeMessage(session);
165            message.setFrom(from);
166            message.setRecipients(Message.RecipientType.TO, to);
167            if (cc != null) {
168                message.setRecipients(Message.RecipientType.CC, cc);
169            }
170            if (bcc != null) {
171                message.setRecipients(Message.RecipientType.BCC, bcc);
172            }
173            message.setSubject(subject);
174
175            String type = params.get("type")
176                    .defaultTo(params.get("_type"))
177                    .defaultTo("text/plain")
178                    .asString();
179            Object body = params.get("body")
180                    .defaultTo(params.get("_body"))
181                    .getObject();
182
183            if (type.equalsIgnoreCase("text/plain") || type.equalsIgnoreCase("text/html") || type.equalsIgnoreCase("text/xml")) {
184                if (body != null && body instanceof String) {
185                    message.setContent(body, type);
186                } else {
187                    message.setText("<empty message>");
188                }
189            } else {
190                // no idea what this is... let's throw
191                throw new BadRequestException("Email type: " + type + " is not handled");
192            }
193
194            Transport transport = session.getTransport("smtp");
195
196            if (smtpAuth) {
197                transport.connect(username, password);
198            } else {
199                transport.connect();
200            }
201            message.saveChanges();
202            transport.sendMessage(message, message.getAllRecipients());
203            transport.close();
204
205        } catch (MessagingException e) {
206            throw new BadRequestException(e);
207        }
208    }
209
210    public void format() {
211    }
212}
